snippet: Rafa Márquez, a former Red Bulls player, made Mexico’s World Cup roster at 35.
abstract: Former New York Red Bulls player Rafael Marquez makes Mexico's World Cup roster at age 35; stands to become first player to captain his nation in four World Cups.
lead_paragraph: Rafa Márquez, a former Red Bulls player, made Mexico’s World Cup roster at 35.

headline.main: Márquez, 35, on Mexico’s World Cup Roster
headline.print_headline: Márquez, 35, on Mexico’s World Cup Roster
